steps.name: User is on OrangeHRM page and logs in

elements.name: To create a job vacancy for �DevOps Engineer�

steps.name: User navigates to the Recruitment page
User clicks on the Vacancies menu item to navigate to the vacancies page
Click on the Add button to navigate to the Add Job Vacancy form
Fill out the details like "DevOps Engineer", "DevOps vacancy J1", "Hugh Jackman", "3"
User clicks the Save button
Verify that the vacancy was created for "DevOps Engineer"

elements.name: Add information about a candidate for recruitment

Upload a resume to the form
User clicks the Save button
Navigate back to the Recruitments page to confirm candidate entry

elements.name: Add multiple employees using the Examples table

steps.name: User navigates to the PIM option in the menu and click it
Click the Add button to add a new Employee
Make sure the Create Login Details checkbox is checked
Fill in the "Jwala1", "cc1", "12111", and "jwjw1"
User clicks the Save button
Verify that the employee "Jwala1", "cc1" has been created

steps.name: User is on Alchemy Jobs site

elements.name: Search and apply for job

steps.name: User navigates to Jobs page
User finds the Keywords search input field
Type in keywords to search for jobs
Find the filter using XPath and filter job type to show only Full Time jobs
User finds a job listing using XPath and click it to see job details
Find the title of the job listing using XPath and print it to the console
Find and Click on the Apply for job button

elements.name: User is in Alchemy Jobs site

elements.name: Post a job using parameterization

steps.name: User navigates to Post a Job page
User enters "jwala12@gmail.com" and Job title as "Automation Tester"
Type in Description as "Need a tester with knowledge of JAVA, Python, Selenium, Cucumber."

arguments.val: Need a tester with knowledge of JAVA, Python, Selenium, Cucumber.

steps.name: Enter Application email as "test@gmail.com" and company as "IBM"
User click Preview and Submit listing
View listing in Alchemy Jobs for "Automation Tester"
